channel.title: Need help with kills
channel.description: how do you edit skills in character folder in testscape?Sorry for the newby question but im new to testcape and ive ebn using nixscape and hybrid scape so far and i havent had trouble editing the skill lvls. but when i try to edit on testscape its al to lvl one again.I open my character that i want to edit,max out everithing,save,compile and run surver..dont know whats wrong,but everithing is like it was before i edited the skills on that char. If you can please help[br][size=1]Posted at: July 24, 2006, 01:47:58 AM[/size][hr]oh and by the way sorry for the name i meant skills not kills...sry

item.title: Need help with kills

item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

in testscape its not possible to edit a character
with just changing the file,
it needs to be happened ingame.
and yea, setxp works, so do it with that.

item.title: Need help with kills
item.dc:creator: @jmull jmull
item.description:
@jmull wrote:

not sure, sorry.

try maybe maxing out skills 1 at a time in the server by using the command ::setxp 500000000

Yes, 500 million, I believe this sets you to the max level possible.

Also I believe you have to edit that in the client.java to make it work for you since I tihnk it only work for one person. Could be wrong. just search for ‘("setxp’ or something without the single quotes.

Read full topic
